definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: This illustration shows a vertical section through the locust.
sentences.chinese: 本圖所示爲蝗蟲的縱剖面。

sentences.english: The diagram below is a cross-section of a typical dwelling in a ZED.
sentences.chinese: 下面的圖表是一個典型的ZED住宅縱剖面。

sentences.english: This paper discusses a one-dimensional cellular model for simulating river profile evolution.
sentences.chinese: 利用一維元胞模型對河道縱剖面的調整進行動態模擬。

sentences.english: The porous structure is not found on the vertical section.
sentences.chinese: 縱剖面上沒有疏鬆多孔結構。
